Multi-functional design: Designing a bicycle helmet that can also serve as a water bottle holder or a phone mount, allowing the rider to stay hydrated and keep an eye on their phone while cycling.

Integrating a built-in GPS and navigation system: Incorporating a GPS system and navigation features into the helmet can help cyclists find their way around unfamiliar routes and track their progress.
Enhancing safety features: Adding reflective strips, lights, and speakers to the helmet can increase visibility and alertness to other road users, reducing the risk of accidents.
Customizable design: Offering a range of colors, patterns, and designs to cater to individual preferences and styles, making the helmet more appealing and personalized.
Sustainable materials: Using eco-friendly and sustainable materials in the production of the helmet, reducing its environmental impact and appeal to eco-conscious consumers.
